person.persName: John Millibank Delph (Louisville mayor (61-63) and legislator (63-65))

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky mayor and legislator. Madison County,Virginia native. Son of Daniel Delph and Ann Millibank Delph. Married Eliza F. Spurr. Married Ellen L Schwing Delph in 1837. Father of Eliza Delph, Charles Delph, and Louisa Delph. Apprenticed with Matthew Kennedy in Lexington, Kentucky. Worked in real estate in Louisville. Served as the Louisville city tax collector, and Jefferson County constable, sheriff, and deputy marshal for ten years. Served on the city council in 1844 and from 1848 to 1849. Mayor of Louisville from 1850 to 1852 and 1861 to 1863. Served on the Louisville Board of Aldermen from1853 to 1854. Served in the Kentucky General Assembly from 1863 to 1865. Helped found the Walnut Street Baptist Church, Louisville.
